Mental Health: Recording and playing back dreams could help individuals better understand and analyze their subconscious thoughts, potentially leading to improved mental health.
Therapy: Therapists could use recorded dreams to help patients explore their inner world and work through past traumas.

Scientific Research: Scientists could study recorded dreams to gain a better understanding of the human mind and brain function.
